name: TechMantra Software Solutions
overview:
Techmantra is founded by the team, who was behind the successful rollout of a highly complex and business critical ecommerce application for a fortune 50 retail company. TechMantra%u2019s management team harbors a common goal of providing high quality technical consulting services and solutions to its clients prima focus being on Super niche technology areas.

Services: TechMantra offers a wide range of solutions catering to our clients%u2019 mission critical needs on the Retail domain.

Professional Consulting: IT Project Management ATG Technology consulting IBM WCS Consulting

Application Development: Portals and Content Management ATG Software Development ATG technical support

Testing Services: Testing Factory Model : Cost effective means to validate client%u2019s software testing requirements

echMantra is a global IT solutions provider delivering technology driven business solutions that meets the strategic needs of our clients. We offer solutions and recommendations to help reduce our client%u2019s time to market needs with high degree of cost effectiveness and excellent quality.

TechMantra%u2019s culture is founded on our belief of %u201CSmart%u201D working and not just %u201CHard%u201D working, to keep our resources always a notch ahead. Techmantra strives to hire and retain outstanding professionals and integrate with the latest technological trends to keep abreast of the volatile IT industry trends.

Our Strength:

Management with combined experience of 35 years in the IT industry in planning and delivery of extremely complex projects covering a comprehensive breadth of technologies and functional areas.

Specialized Program Management, Architecture, Sales and Marketing personnel. Relevant skills on sales, Requirement Analysis, Design, Execution and implementation. Providing cost effective Services Program Management (With thought leadership) Quality focus (Process tailored and simplified for seamless project execution) Marketing, Sales, Execution, Technology Expertise Functional Expertise

Our strength is highly competent and committed people; working on multiple domains and wide range of technologies.

We are extremely focused on our customer satisfaction and all our resources are trained to handle their customer requirements with utmost care

Our Quality Mantra is %u201CProactive Quality Management and not Reactive%u201D. Quality is guaranteed with us.

Our advisory board consists of industry leaders reviewing the performance and providing guidance at periodic intervals.

Resources available in Global time zones, providing day time cover for EMEA, APAC, ASEAN and Fareast Regions.

Our Solutions: mantraiCom : A hosted ecommerce solution for our customers to go online in just less than 5 weeks duration

DigiStore : No more paper work, this product make you store your documnets in a central repository and you can search the content when needed

DocAid : An end to end solution which connects Doctors, patients and Labs
